titleStmt.title: A speech made before the King's most Excellent Majesty Charles the Second, on the shore where he landed at Dover. By Mr. John Reading B.D. who presented his Majesty with a Bible, the gift of the inhabitants there, May 25th. 1660.
titleStmt.author: Reading, John, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
